chapters.title: Chapter 24:  A Strengthening Storm
chapters.info: Herid Fel, p. 557 (673)—Late philosopher who worked in Rand's school of thought at the Barthanes estate in Cairhien. He was torn limb from limb by a gholam for unknown reasons, although it is likely that he had stumbled upon something quite damaging to the cause of the Shadow if they would send a gholam to do the job. Min is currently reading his book, Reason and Unreason, in an attempt to better understand why he was murdered. Rand cannot make up from down in Fel's books, but Min finds them fascinating. See also Farshaw, Elmindreda.
